about.heading: About Us
about.paragraph:
VC AL-AAF is an enthusiastic carnival association from Limburg that has been building beautiful floats for the carnival parade with passion and creativity for years.

Every year we gather a dedicated team of volunteers who work for months on a spectacular work of art on wheels. From the first design to the final brushstroke - everything is made with love and attention to detail.

Would you like to be part of this great tradition? Become a sponsor and help us build another unforgettable float in 2026!
